help.title: Welcome to NHL.js! A discord.js/nhl.com bot
help.desc: Here's how to work with the bot

fields.name: !config
fields.value: This displays the current system setup.

fields.name: !channel [channelID or #channel]
fields.value: This establishes the channel to use for watch updates (required to be set!).

fields.name: !permission [@role or roleID] [level]
fields.value: This adjusts (adds and removes) permissions from roles. Call !permission -h for more info.

fields.name: !daily
fields.value: This toggles the daily schedule updates (default is set to off)

fields.name: !help
fields.value: Shows this help message (but you've figured that out)

help.footer: Enjoy! Please let us know of issues by vising our github

permissionHelp.title: Permissions, aren't they fun?
permissionHelp.desc: Here's how to work with them for this bot

fields.name: Level: configure
fields.value: This allows a role to gain configuration access of the bot as well as all other permissions

fields.name: Level: watch
fields.value: This allows a role to gain the ability to request games to be 'watched'

fields.name: Level: interact
fields.value: This allows a role to interact with the bot

fields.name: Level: none
fields.value: When specified, this removes previously established permissions for a role

permissionHelp.footer: Enjoy! Please let us know of issues by vising our github

dailyHelp.title: Want dem updates?
dailyHelp.desc: Here's how to configure the daily command

fields.name: !daily
fields.value: This is the base command & just toggles updates on and off

fields.name: !daily -h
fields.value: This is the help command; it shows this message

fields.name: !daily HH:MM in 24hr Time (AKA hrs are 0-23)
fields.value: This command sets the time (in EST) for when to run the updates. Default is 7 AM

dailyHelp.footer: Need assistance? Reach out on our github

errorParams.title: Whoops, I think somethings missing...
errorParams.desc: Field(s) may be missing/invalid for this command. See !help for clarification
errorParams.footer: Enjoy! Please let us know of issues by vising our github

errorExecution.title: Well shoot
errorExecution.desc: Looks like we really wiffed on that slapshot, an internal error ocurred
errorExecution.footer: Please reach out to our github if the issue persists

errorPermissions.title: Hey bud go give your balls a tug
errorPermissions.desc: Yous guys don'ts haves permissions fors thats
errorPermissions.footer: Please reach out to our github if this is incorrect
